mapper.select:
SELECT t.uid, t.id, t.document_number, t.approval_status, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.alert_node, t.apply_name, t.apply_date, t.title, t.budget_duty_department, t.project_name, t.attribution_organization, t.budget_version, t.budget_year, t.project_cycle_target_sign_up, t.project_cycle_target_cost, t.project_cycle_target_rate, t.total_cost, t.quarterly_illustrate
,op1.operation_name,op1.by_operation_people_id
FROM
t_oa_marketing_fuse t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{param.ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_marketing_fuse t on op.uid=t.uid
t.id =#{param.id}
and t.document_number like "%" #{param.documentNumber} "%"
and t.project_name like "%" #{param.projectName} "%"
and t.attribution_organization like "%" #{param.attributionOrganization} "%"
and t.budget_duty_department like "%" #{param.budgetDutyDepartment} "%"
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(t.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{param.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and t.alert_node=#{param.alertNode}
and t.has_read =#{param.hasRead}
and t.monitor_status =#{param.monitorStatus}
order by update_time desc

select count(*) total, count(case when has_read = 'beread' then 1 end) beread, count(case when monitor_status = 'special_attention' then 1 end) specialAttention, count(case when monitor_status = 'warning' then 1 end) warning, count(case when monitor_status = 'normal' then 1 end) normal from ( SELECT t.id, t.document_number, t.project_name, t.attribution_organization, t.budget_duty_department, t.apply_date, t.has_read, t.monitor_status, t.alert_node FROM
t_oa_marketing_fuse t
(select Max(id) id,uid from t_oa_operation where by_operation_people_id =#{ldapId} group by uid) op inner join t_oa_operation op1 on op.id=op1.id inner join t_oa_marketing_fuse t on op.uid=t.uid
) oa
oa.id =#{id}
and oa.document_number like "%" #{documentNumber} "%"
and oa.project_name like "%" #{projectName} "%"
and oa.attribution_organization like "%" #{attributionOrganization} "%"
and oa.budget_duty_department like "%" #{budgetDutyDepartment} "%"
and DATE_FORMAT(oa.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and DATE_FORMAT(oa.apply_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and oa.alert_node=#{alertNode}
